content.question: What is implied about Shiro?

choices.label: Shiro is particularly popular with older visitors.
Shiro is a longtime resident of the area.
Shiro is not in service on rainy days.

content.answer: Shiro is not in service on rainy days.

unit.text: 4: How Science and Technology Affect Our Lives

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Interpret the meanings of a text.
